title: Client redownloads everything after crash [Client]
body:
I was playing a normal game then when i lost my connection.
I tried to reconnect but it fails, so i close and reopen my client.
But when i reopen my client, it starts downloading "interface" for 950 ish mb(?) 
I though it is a new patch at first, but my friend said he just logged on and his client doesnt patch. 
So i tried to relog and it still trying to redownload the client......

Is there anything i can do to fix this? I dont want to redownload 3gb with my 100kbps connection.. please help.
Sorry for bad english. I hope i post this in the right section.

[Edit] I tried to "Repair" but nothing happened. 
Please tell me what information/logs i should provide.

replies.body: In this situation, I recommend opening a technical support ticket, they will be able to help you more. This seems to be more specific to your machine.

my bro who uses useless sri lankan internet (hes studying there (supposed to be)) had the same prob when he tries to login with a different account every time he changes from his acc to mine or vise versa the client re downloads itself
